definitions.definition: The act of relying (on or in someone or something); trust.
definitions.example: Your reliance on his expertise may be misplaced.

definitions.definition: The condition of being reliant or dependent.
definitions.example: The industry is working to phase out its reliance on fossil fuels.

definitions.definition: Anything on which to rely; ground of trust.
definitions.example: The boat was a poor reliance.

definitions.definition: A person or thing which relies on another.
